data.message: does anybody have an idea how I would contact Eminem or one of his reps? I am in the military currently deployed and would like to fly a flag in tribute of him and send it to him. I don't want anything out of it. He has always been one of my favorite artist and inspirations, and I just thought it would be an honor to give back to him other then request for autographs. any reply would be greatly appreciated.
